mainText:
Hello,

I didn't know Steve personally but he has inspired me more than anyone else on the planet. 

People who know me, know I love Apple.

I'm currently majoring in Game and Simulation Programming. And making video games is a dream of mine and always has been. 

Seeing Steve Jobs' Stanford Commencement Speech changed my life. The quote "if today was my last day alive would I do what I'm about to do right now" is what did it. 

I decided why the hell not try and reach the goal and make that dream come true.
author: Tyler
